pubsImportTask.title: Workflow to Publish and View Augmented Reality Experience

pubsImpTaskBody.p: You must have a PTC user account to publish and share the augmented reality experience models.

li.p: Open a part or assembly in .

On the Tools tab, click Spatial Target. The Spatial Target tab opens. Use the options on the tab to specify the location on which the model will be augmented to a horizontal surface. The spatial placement feature is added under Augmented Reality, under the footer in the Model Tree.
If your model contains ThingMark, it is automatically converted to a Spatial Target upon retrieval.
Publish the augmented reality experience to the Experience Service using the Publish dialog box.
Click Manage Models to share the experience model with others by email.

pubsImpTaskBody.p: You will be presented with an authentication dialog box the first time you publish or share the experience model in the session. Use your PTC credentials to authenticate. The login is retained for a session.

section.title: To View the Augmented Reality Experience Models

li.p: Download on your handheld device from the following:

p.xref: Google Play store for Android devices

li.p:
Click the Experience link. opens. You do not need to authenticate to view the augmented reality experience published to the Personal Experience Service. If the experience is published to a Premium service, an authentication dialog will appear. Provide your PTC credentials.
If you do not have the access to view the model, an error message will appear. Ask the author of the model to add you as a viewer for the model.
Select the surface on which you want to augment the model.
reads the data from the server and prepares the experience based on the configuration in . The augmented model is anchored to the selected surface.
The default experience allows you to rotate, translate, and zoom into the model. You can bookmark an Experience.
